Description of incident: Paytime Inc, a payroll service for corporations, notified customers of a data breach to their payroll system. The hackers obtained usernames and passwords to their system and were able to obtain Social Security numbers, direct deposit account information, dates of birth, hire dates, wage information, home and cell phone numbers, other payroll information and home addresses.The company is providing one year free of AllClearID. Those affected are asked to call 1-855-398-6436.
